function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Underreporting of COVID-19 cases","Impact":"Inaccurate estimation of the spread of the disease and potential underestimation of risk","Mitigation":"Increased testing, improved reporting procedures, and data verification processes","Technologies":"Improved testing methods, data analytics, and reporting tools","People":"General public, healthcare workers, government officials","Owner":"Health authorities, governments, data analysts"},{"Description":"Unreliable death data","Impact":"Inaccurate representation of the severity of the epidemic and potential misallocation of resources","Mitigation":"Improved reporting procedures, cross-verification of data, and data transparency","Technologies":"Data analytics, data verification tools, and reporting platforms","People":"General public, healthcare workers, government officials","Owner":"Health authorities, data analysts"},{"Description":"Inconsistent non-pharmaceutical interventions","Impact":"Ineffective containment of the disease spread and confusion among the public","Mitigation":"Standardization of intervention strategies, clear communication, and coordination among health authorities","Technologies":"Communication tools, data analytics for intervention impact assessment","People":"General public, government officials, healthcare workers","Owner":"Health authorities, government"}]}
